thread.title: Ground News - Oilers make another statement, use measuring stick to beat Kings
thread.title_full: Ground News - Oilers make another statement, use measuring stick to beat Kings

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Oilers make another statement, use measuring stick to beat Kings
text:
Summary by Ground News The Edmonton Oilers and Los Angeles Kings are turning their mutual dislike into one of the most compelling feuds in hockey. The two rivals, meeting for the first time since Edmonton eliminated L.A. last year, picked up right where they off last April. The Oilers prevailed 3-2 in a hard-hitting and dramatic shootout victory. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Edmonton Journal Center High Factuality Oilers make another statement, use measuring stick to beat Kings "Every time we're in this building it feels like the exact same game," said Oilers captain Connor McDavid, after Derek Ryan scored in the fourth round of the shootout to seal the comeback win. "Just rinse and repeat. It's the same game over and over again.
3 hours ago · Edmonton, Canada Read Full Article
